DOC.detailed_description: The use femtosecond ( FS ) laser become one significant technological advancement refractive surgery . A breakthrough FS laser-assisted myopic myopic astigmatic correction procedure perform use prototype femtosecond system . This first all-in-one FS-laser system design perform refractive lenticule extraction ( ReLEx ) procedure , femtosecond lenticule extraction ( FLEx ) small-incision lenticule extraction ( SMILE ) . In FLEx , corneal flap create FS laser ( similar LASIK ) lift , allow lenticule removal . For SMILE , truly without flap procedure , small—2-4mm— incision make , lenticule remove . Ocular surface disruption corneal refractive surgery commonly consider closely related development dry eye . Multiple etiology contribute ocular surface disruption , include flap creation stromal ablation involve previous refractive surgery technique . Corneal nerve damage consider main cause dry eye , due disrupt afferent sensory nerve , reduce blink reflex , increase tear evaporation lead tear film instability . In addition , postoperative inflammatory mediator fluctuation also key factor relate ocular surface damage . Extensive research describe effect cytokine , chemokines growth factor modulate corneal wound healing , cell migration , apoptosis ocular surface refractive surgery . For FLEx SMILE , stromal ablation replace refractive lenticule removal . In term corneal flap formation , FLEx still require epithelial-stromal flap , SMILE employ small incision extract lenticule . Hence , investigator hypothesize SMILE less effect patient ' ocular surface marker inflammatory mediator , compare FLEx .
